meanings.definition: A powered flying vehicle with fixed wings and a weight greater than that of the air it displaces.
meanings.sent1: The airplane soared high above the clouds.
meanings.sent2: I saw an airplane flying over my house.
meanings.sent3: The airplane seemed to wave at the birds as it passed by.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took flight like an airplane in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The loud roar of the airplane's engines filled the air.

meanings.sent1: We will airplane to our vacation destination next week.
meanings.sent2: She loves to airplane to different countries and experience new cultures.
meanings.sent3: Let's airplane to the moon for a quick visit!
meanings.sent4: His thoughts airplane to far-off lands when he daydreams.
meanings.sent5: They decided to airplane to Paris for the weekend getaway.
